title: Suspect arrested over Atulugama girl’s death
body_lines: A 29-year-old man was taken into custody over the death of the 9-year old girl from Atulugama, police said.
They said several statements were recorded into the death of the girl and CID is conducting investigations.
Meanwhile, the post mortem investigations into the girl's death will be conducted today at the Panadura Hospital.
The body of the girl who went missing on Friday was recovered on Saturday at a marshy land near her house in Atulugama.
